timeline.bodyText: Might want to declare List<Exercise> exercises = studentExam.getExercises() here to avoid multiple database accesses fetching the list several times (lines 77, 78, 83, 90, 93) if that is not specifically intended
timeline.author: balazs-czopf

replies.bodyText: there is no database access, all exercises are already fetched.
replies.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText:
If I see this correctly, some of this code is duplicated.
I suggest that you try to extract methods for the duplicated parts
timeline.author: krusche

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into exam/manage/summary

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/webapp/app/exam/manage/exam-management.route.ts

small code improvements

isAtLeastInstructor is already available in the course

fix some issues in the summary and in student details view

mostly type script errors
programming summary does not need a submission
added some additional checks in case the submission is not available

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be better to return directly when an accessFailure occurs. This makes sense not only with regard to the procedure, but also because the access service checks whether the studentExam exists at all.
timeline.author: sascha11110
